content: 思路: // @Title: 位 1 的个数 (位 1 的个数) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-20 14:22:21 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 38.3 MB // @comment: // @flag: public class Solution { // you need to treat n as an unsigned value public static int hammingWeight(int n) { int temp=n; int count=0; while(temp!=0){ if((temp&1)==1){ count++; } temp=temp>>>1; } return count; } }
